markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 5" pfs="Standard">[Elemental Blast](/Spells.aspx?ID=503)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Sorcerer" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=148" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 404 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Bloodline**
[Elemental](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=6)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet (burst only)

**Area** 10-foot-radius burst, 30-foot cone, or 60-foot line

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Saving Throw** [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex

</row>

</column>

---

You gather elemental energy and blast your foes in one of the various listed shapes of your choosing, dealing 8d6 bludgeoning damage (or fire damage if your element is fire). This spell has your element's trait.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The damage increases by 2d6.
name: Elemental Blast

summary: You gather elemental energy and blast your foes.
summary_markdown: You gather elemental energy and blast your foes.
text: Elemental Blast Source Core Rulebook pg. 404 4.0 Bloodline Elemental Cast Two Actions somatic, verbal Range 30 feet (burst only) Area 10-foot-radius burst, 30-foot cone, or 60-foot line Saving Throw basic Reflex --- You gather elemental energy and blast your foes in one of the various listed shapes of your choosing, dealing 8d6 bludgeoning damage (or fire damage if your element is fire). This spell has your element's trait. --- Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d6.
